summary: The script demonstrates how to fine‑tune a FastPitch text‑to‑speech model using adapter modules. It modifies the model configuration to enable adapters, injects a global adapter configuration, and launches a training run with NeMo's experiment manager and PyTorch Lightning.
business_intent: Provide a quick way to adapt a pre‑trained speech synthesis model to new voices or domains with minimal additional training, lowering development time and computational cost for customized TTS solutions.
